briefTitle: Prevalence of Vitamin D Deficiency in Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus and Effect of Supplementation on Insulin Requirements

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Newly diagnosed type I DM.
* Age \<18 years

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnancy

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Hemoglobin A1c
outcomeMeasures.description: Change in hemoglobin A1c calculated as a percentage change from baseline measurement

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Insulin Requirements
outcomeMeasures.description: Percentage change from baseline number of units of lantus insulin over 6 months.
